| icon           = poe2 oderisis_notes icon.png
| description    = Oderisi's notes, acquired from his corpse, are a dense collection of jargon and diagrams. They allude to mechanical and chemical processes used to treat adra while it is refined into powder. These notes would doubtless be of interest to those working directly with luminous adra.
